feed.title: Zitnik Lab
feed.subtitle: Harvard Machine Learning for Medicine and Science

entry.title: CUREBench - Reasoning for Therapeutics
entry.content: Update from CUREBench: 650+ entrants, 100+ teams and 500+ submissions. Thank you to the CUREBench community. Working on AI for drug discovery and reasoning in medicine? New teams welcome. Tasks, rules, and leaderboard: https://curebench.ai.
entry.summary: Update from CUREBench: 650+ entrants, 100+ teams and 500+ submissions. Thank you to the CUREBench community. Working on AI for drug discovery and reasoning in medicine? New teams welcome. Tasks, rules, and leaderboard: https://curebench.ai.

entry.title: AI for Science Workshop at NeurIPS

link.title: AI for Science Workshop at NeurIPS

entry.content: Excited to organize a NeurIPS workshop on AI for Science. This is our 6th workshop in the AI for Science series. Submit your papers.
entry.summary: Excited to organize a NeurIPS workshop on AI for Science. This is our 6th workshop in the AI for Science series. Submit your papers.

entry.title: Drug Discovery Workshop at NeurIPS 2025
entry.content: Excited to organize a NeurIPS workshop on Virtual Cells and Digital Instruments. Submit your papers.
entry.summary: Excited to organize a NeurIPS workshop on Virtual Cells and Digital Instruments. Submit your papers.

entry.title: Launching CUREBench
entry.content: Launched CUREBench, the first competition in AI reasoning for therapeutics. Colocated with NeurIPS 2025. Start at https://curebench.ai.
entry.summary: Launched CUREBench, the first competition in AI reasoning for therapeutics. Colocated with NeurIPS 2025. Start at https://curebench.ai.

entry.title: Launching TxAgent Evaluation Portal
entry.content: Launched TxAgent evaluation portal, our global evaluation of AI for drug decision-making and therapeutic reasoning. Participate in TxAgent evaluations! [TxAgent project]
entry.summary: Launched TxAgent evaluation portal, our global evaluation of AI for drug decision-making and therapeutic reasoning. Participate in TxAgent evaluations! [TxAgent project]

entry.title: SPATIA Model of Spatial Cell Phenotypes

link.title: SPATIA Model of Spatial Cell Phenotypes

entry.content: New preprint on SPATIA: a multimodal model for pediction and generation of spatial cell phenotypes.
entry.summary: New preprint on SPATIA: a multimodal model for pediction and generation of spatial cell phenotypes.

entry.title: AI-Enabled Drug Discovery Reaches Clinical Milestone

link.title: AI-Enabled Drug Discovery Reaches Clinical Milestone

entry.content: New piece in Nature Medicine on AI-enabled drug discovery reaching a clinical milestone.
entry.summary: New piece in Nature Medicine on AI-enabled drug discovery reaching a clinical milestone.

entry.title: Knowledge Tracing for Biomedical AI Education

link.title: Knowledge Tracing for Biomedical AI Education

entry.content: New preprint on biologically inspired architecture for knowledge tracing. The study on the use of generative AI in education with prospective evaluation of knowledge tracing in the classroom.
entry.summary: New preprint on biologically inspired architecture for knowledge tracing. The study on the use of generative AI in education with prospective evaluation of knowledge tracing in the classroom.

entry.title: Few shot learning for rare disease diagnosis

link.title: Few shot learning for rare disease diagnosis

entry.content: New paper in npj Digital Medicine: Few shot learning for phenotype-driven diagnosis of patients with rare genetic diseases.
entry.summary: New paper in npj Digital Medicine: Few shot learning for phenotype-driven diagnosis of patients with rare genetic diseases.

entry.content: New preprint: One patient, many contexts: Scaling medical AI through contextual intelligence
